text: Marcus Edward Trescothick (born 25 December 1975) is an English cricketer. He was born in Keynsham, Somerset. He is a batsman. He played 76 test matches and 123 one day internationals for the England cricket team. He has stopped playing cricket for the England cricket team now. He still plays cricket for Somerset County Cricket Club. Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:English and Welsh cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Somerset
title: Marcus Trescothick
